GetProductStockWithUpdLockForOrder.Statement: SELECT stock FROM w2_ProductStock WITH (UPDLOCK) WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND product_id = @product_id AND variation_id = @variation_id

UpdateProductStockForOrder.Statement: UPDATE w2_ProductStock SET w2_ProductStock.stock = w2_ProductStock.stock + @item_quantity, w2_ProductStock.date_changed = getdate(), w2_ProductStock.last_changed = @last_changed FROM w2_ProductStock WHERE w2_ProductStock.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ProductStock.product_id = @product_id AND w2_ProductStock.variation_id = @variation_id
